content.question: The national debt is equal to which of the following?

choices.label: The value of all government bonds held by the nation’s central bank
The value of all loans in the nation’s banking system
The sum of all past government budget deficits and surpluses
The interest payments on the previous year’s government debt

content.answer: The sum of all past government budget deficits and surpluses

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt
